definition: palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield

sentences.english: Palm-hitting, the anterior fontanelle of the vertex and Baihui.
sentences.chinese: 掌击法常用于头顶前囟与百会。

sentences.english: The impatient teacher slapped the student.
sentences.chinese: 这位不耐烦的老师掌击了学生。

sentences.english: Palm - hitting , the anterior fontanelle of the vertex and Baihui.
sentences.chinese: 掌击法常用于头顶前囟与百会。

sentences.english: The impatient teacher slapped the student; a gunshot slapped him on the forehead.
sentences.chinese: 这位不耐烦的老师掌击着学生。

definition: with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
hand formed into a flat shape, as for a karate chop
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it
pinyin: shuo1 shi2 chi2 , na4 shi2 kuai4

definition: to hit with a piercing blow
